articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Power Station
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Huichon Power Station under construction.
					 After acquainting himself with the progress made in the construction of the power station, he visited the surge tank construction site of Guards Unit 210 of the KPA, riding along lots of ridge roads newly constructed on many mountains.
					
					 After receiving a salute, he personally made his way to the underground cutting face where water was dropping from its ceiling to learn in detail about the progress made in the project and warmly encourage the soldier-builders.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to learn that they have done a lot of work in a short span of time. He highly appreciated their success in the construction and extended thanks to them.
					
					 It is a great success that the soldiers of the unit have carried out a huge volume of work in a matter of a few months which would have taken several years at ordinary pace, he said, adding that this is a great miracle of Songun Korea which can be worked only by the servicepersons of the KPA who created the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 Inexhaustible is the mental power of the servicepersons, the fighters who flatten even a high mountain at one go in a do-or-die spirit, if instructed by the Party to do so, he noted, adding that no force on the earth can overpower this great strength of the KPA single-mindedly rallied around the WPK.
					
					 Then, he mounted an observation platform to command a bird's-eye view of the construction sites.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the construction sites alive with the labor drive, including the iron pipe construction and the construction of the generator room, he expressed great satisfaction over the rapid progress made in the construction of the power station.
					
					 Watching the eye-opening construction sites of the power station now being successfully built with the domestic efforts, technology and materials, he said: It is possible to undertake any gigantic nature-remaking project by our own efforts if we have a will as there is the powerful Juche-based industry firmly built by us, tightening our belts. This clearly proves the validity and tremendous vitality of the WPK's line of economic construction on giving priority to the development of heavy industry.
					
					 Noting that the devoted labor drive of the soldier-builders who created "Huichon Speed," a new Chollima speed, and other builders of the power station opened a bright prospect for completing the construction of the large-scale Huichon Power Station before 2012, he extended warm greetings to all the builders waging a high-pitched drive in the revolutionary soldier spirit and the revolutionary spirit of fortitude.   
					
					 The construction of the power station is one of the priority tasks for building a thriving nation and, at the same time, an important work to carry out President Kim Il Sung's behests, he noted, advancing important tasks that would serve as guidelines for completing the construction of the power station earlier than scheduled. 
					
					 It is difficult to build a hydro-power station but once it is constructed, it is more advantageous than an atomic power plant, he said, underlining the need to build more hydro-power stations in different parts of the country.
					
					 Pointing out that supply service is one of the main factors of increasing the speed of the construction, he stressed that it is necessary to take warm care of the builders so that they may not feel any slightest inconvenience in their living.   
					
					 He had a photo session with the soldier-builders of KPA Unit 210.
					
					 He was accompanied by Chief Secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK Pak To Chun, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by People's Interior Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by People's Interior Forces
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Interior Forces.
					 Put on the stage were female chorus "Soldiers Sing of Their Supreme Commander", female guitar quintet "This Country Is So Good", male solo and Pangchang "Spring Reflecting Loving Care", female solo "Country Will Recognize You", Oungum solo "Kitchen Car Runs", story-telling and female solo "Here is My Country, Land of Chollima", accordion trio "Song of Best Wishes" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang high praises of their high honor and pride of living and struggling as revolutionary soldiers of the Party and the leader and defenders of the people and successfully represented the unshakable faith and will of the interior forces to defend the socialist system in the DPRK as firm as a rock.
					
					 The revolutionary and militant performance deeply impressed the audience as it truthfully represented the noble spiritual world of the sentinels in the class struggle. 
					
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their success in the presentation. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the song and dance ensemble gave a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry as it is distinct in the policy stand and pervaded with the spirit of the times. He highly appreciated the successful performance and extended thanks to the artistes. 
					
					 Noting that the song and dance ensemble has a very important mission and duty to fulfill, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for its creative work and performing activities. 
					
					 Among the audience were Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Interior Forces, and other commanding officers of the forces, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Zimbabwean President
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Robert G. Mugabe, president of Zimbabwe, on April 13 on the occasion of the 30th birthday of the Republic of Zimbabwe.
					 In the message Kim noted that under the correct leadership of the president the Zimbabwean people have made great progress in the struggle to consolidate the national independence, frustrating the ceaseless interference of foreign forces over the past 30 years.
					
					 Expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, he sincerely wished the president and people of Zimbabwe bigger success in their work for political stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Chinese Premier Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Chinese Premier Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su paid a farewell call on Premier of the State Council of China Wen Jiabao on April 13.
					 Wen said that he was accorded the warm reception and cordial hospitality by the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK during his visit to the DPRK last year that marked the diamond jubilee of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries and the "year of the Sino-DPRK friendship."
					
					 He recalled with deep emotion that General Secretary Kim Jong Il personally accompanied him at various events and received him for a long time. 
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship personally provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is the friendship which stood the test of history and the friendship demonstrating fresh vitality as the days go by, he said, adding that it is the invariable policy of the party and government of China to steadily develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 Visiting the DPRK last year, I saw for myself the great successes made by it in socialist construction despite difficulties, he noted, 
					
					expressing sincere hope that the Korean people would develop economy and improve the people's standard of living to build a rich and powerful country.

articles.title: Officials Appreciate Concert
articles.content:
Officials Appreciate Concert
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A concert for commemorating the Day of the Sun was given here by artistes of the Unhasu Orchestra and other national art troupes on Saturday.
					 The concert was appreciated by senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and officials and working people of different strata in the city.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus and piano duet "Nostalgia", female trio and chorus "Mangyongdae, the Cradle of Revolution", female solo "His Eternal Smile" and female sextet "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea and father of the nation, who ushered in the period of full efflorescence of independence and prosperity on this land.
					
					 They truthfully represented the firm faith and will of the Korean army and people to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Festival Continues
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Festival Continues
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 12th Kimilsungia Festival, which opened on April 12, is going on at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in Pyongyang, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, to commemorate the 98th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the festival, the theme of which is "Our Leader, Sun of Humankind, Immortal with Kimilsungia", are tens of thousands of Kimilsungia flowers presented by ministries, national institutions, military organs, working people from all social strata, students, schoolchildren, foreign diplomatic missions here, including the Indonesian embassy, friendship and solidarity organizations, and so on.
					
					 Seen in the center of the venue are a picture of the President waving to the cheering crowd, a miniature of his old home in Mangyongdae and a floral basket and Korean map made of Kimilsungia flowers. 
					
					 The exhibited flowers reflect deep reverence of the Korean people and the world's revolutionary people for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 They also show that the revolutionary history of the President has continued.
					
					 During the festival horticulturists, scientists and florists at home and abroad are sharing with each other achievements and experience gained in Kimilsungia cultivation and propagation.

articles.title: Performances of Overseas Koreans Enjoy Popularity
articles.content:
Performances of Overseas Koreans Enjoy Popularity
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Performances of overseas Koreans participating in the Second April Spring People's Art Festival going on in Pyongyang to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, are highly acclaimed by audience.
					 The venue of the performance of the art troupes of Koreans in China and the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) is crowded with Pyongyangites.
					
					 The art troupe of the Koreans in China including Choe Kyong Ho, 47, and other talented actors and actresses put on the stage a colorful program reflecting deep reverence for the President.
					
					 Son Myong Chan, 26, a student of Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, told KCNA that he, seeing the male solo "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and mixed duo "When We Walk along the Road between Fields", felt overseas Korean artistes' profound respect for the President.
					
					 Choe Su Bong, 51, head of the art troupe of Koreans in China, said he was very glad to join people of the homeland in the festival and expressed his determination to present better works to the festival in the future.
					
					 "Frostwork in the Native Place" and other female group dances performed by the International Kothongryon show well their pride of being members of the dignified Korean nation to be enthusiastically applauded by audience.
					
					 Kim Mi Suk, 26, head of the art troupe of the International Kothongryon, who learned dancing in Pyongyang, said she would teach Korean dances to overseas compatriots and contribute to further developing them.
					
					 Art troupes of Koreans in Japan and the United States are also participating in the festival.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated at DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated at DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Receptions, book and photo exhibitions, friendly gatherings and film shows were held at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Laos, Cambodia, Nepal, Myanmar, Pakistan, Uzbekistan, Poland, Romania, UK and Bulgaria from April 1 to 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					On display in the venues of events were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il and photos on undying feats performed by them and books and photos on the real picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					The secretary of State of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia said that
						 Kim Il Sung was a national hero of Korea who firmly protected the DPRK from foreign forces' invasion and turned it into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The minister of Hotel and Tourism of Myanmar noted that the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, expressing confidence that the Korean people would surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union and the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania stressed that Kim Il Sung's whole life was one dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain praised
						 Kim Il Sung as a great leader of the world revolution who built Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, making a great contribution to the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle in various countries.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched such Korean films as "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "The Arch of Triumph" and "The Country I Saw."

articles.title: President's Life Shining with Songun Korea
articles.content:
President's Life Shining with Songun Korea
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Korea is greeting a heyday of progress in an effort to build a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					 The country owes the achievement to President Kim Il Sung, who pioneered the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and provided solid foundations for its accomplishment.
					
					 Having started revolutionary activities in his early years, the President founded revolutionary armed forces first of all with the plan to build a strong nation and achieved national liberation by force of arms.
					
					 After the liberation he developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular armed forces before accomplishing the cause of state building. He had consistently adhered to the line of giving priority to the military affairs in all the years of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the line the Korean people could emerge victorious in two hard-fought revolutionary wars, two stages of social revolution and socialist construction and turn the country into a Juche-oriented socialist nation, independent, self-sufficient and self-reliant in defence. 
					
					 The President also held fast to the principle of Songun in successfully solving the issue of carrying forward the revolutionary cause.
					
					 He handed one of the two pistols he took over from his father Kim Hyong Jik along with the idea of Jiwon (Aim High) down to General Secretary Kim Jong Il and had the leader standing at the top of the revolutionary forces, thus paving the way for a victorious progress of the Korean revolution.
					
					 With the definite guarantee for all-round administration of Songun politics provided by the President the country has continued pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation in the face of challenges and obstructive moves of the imperialists.
					
					 On the occasion of the President's birth anniversary, April 15, Korean people have visited places associated with his revolutionary activities and exploits, recollecting his life devoted to the building of a powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Military Commentator Denies Involvement in Ship Sinking
articles.content:
Military Commentator Denies Involvement in Ship Sinking
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A military commentator Saturday issued an article disclosing the truth about the "story about linkage with the north" floated by the south Korean group of traitors.
					 There occurred an accident in which "Chonan", 1 400 ton-warship of the south Korean puppet navy, sank all of a sudden in the waters between Paekryong Island and Taechong Island in the West Sea of Korea at night of March 26, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Though the sunken large ship belongs to the south side, we have so far regarded the accident as a regretful accident that should not happen in the light of the fact that many missing persons and most of rescued members of the crew are fellow countrymen forced to live a tiresome life in the puppet army.
					
					 Failing to probe the cause of the sinking of the ship, the puppet military warmongers, right-wing conservative politicians and the group of other traitors in south Korea are now foolishly seeking to link the accident with the north at any cost.
					
					 At the outset of the accident the group asserted that no sign of intrusion of the north' submarine was spotted by their so-called "water-tight" maritime caution and round-the-clock radar monitoring and sound detection system.
					
					 But after making a U turn from their earlier stand that there should be no foregone conclusion as regards the accident, the group started floating the "story about the linkage with the north".
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak said that one should not carelessly utter that the north is linked with the accident at its beginning. But from some days ago he began making a spate of accusations against the north while blustering that it is necessary to "probe the accident without a shred of suspicion on the premise of the possible linkage with the north", "thoroughly cope with the movement of the north" and "south Korea will resolutely counter" the north if the cause of the accident is finally confirmed.
					
					 The gentries of "Chongwadae", though they asserted that "there was slim possibility of the north's attack," are now taking an attitude that they are not ruling out the "story about the linkage with the north," jabbering that the testimonies of the survivors and the conditions of the sunken ship suggest a large possibility that the ship was hit hard from outside.
					
					 The military warmongers are getting more undisguised in their moves to link the accident with the north though it was caused by their fault. 
					
					  Disclosing the aim sought by the group in the above-said behavior, the article continued:
					
					 It is prompted by its ulterior intention to get rid of the worst ruling crisis caused by the "state management failure".
					
					 If public opinion is built to claim that the accident occurred due to "an internal factor" and its cause is not properly clarified, the group of traitors will be held directly responsible for it and, accordingly, will not be able to escape a heavy defeat in the forthcoming "June 2 local elections". This will lead to the split of the conservative camp including the "Grand National Party" and the weakening of its ruling power, throwing the group into an inescapable predicament. 
					
					  Another sinister aim sought by the puppet regime in floating the above-said story is to justify the persistent and anachronistic policy towards the DPRK and shirk the blame for having driven the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that from the outset of its office the group of traitors has persistently pursued the inter-Korean confrontation, insisting that "the north dismantle its nukes first." 
					
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea are now becoming evermore vocal critical of the wrong policy pursued by the group towards the north, blatantly challenging the demand of the times and the desire of the nation.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the group is hyping the "story about linkage with the north" in a bid to flee from the responsibility for having deteriorated the north-south relations and justify their mean policy toward the north with the sinking of its warship as a momentum.
					
					 The ruckus kicked up by the puppet authorities while peddling the story is designed to stir up the atmosphere of international sanctions against the north and increase pressure upon it in various aspects. 
					
					 The group of traitors is zealously supporting its American master in his moves to bring down the system in the DPRK, while trying to give impression that the U.S.-led sanctions are proving effective.
					
					 This group is making desperate efforts to block the general advance of the north toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Herein lies another sinister aim sought by the group of traitors in floating the nonsensical "story about the linkage with the north."
					
					 It is a trite trick of the stupid to hatch plots and stoop to any infamy under that pretext whenever they are driven into a tight corner. 
					
					 The group of traitors would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and refrain from uttering any word as it pleases.

articles.title: US Scheme for Enhanced Offensive by Drone Blasted
articles.content:
US Scheme for Enhanced Offensive by Drone Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A legal advisor of the U.S. Department of State recently told that the U.S. government may use drones in armed conflicts with Al Qaeda, Taliban and other armed groups under the provision of "right to self-defence" stipulated in international law and that the U.S. precision strikes including drone-based attacks are conducted in "faithful obedience" to all applicable laws including the law on war.
					 Commenting on such reckless remarks, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 They are no more than shameless sophism that could be made only by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces engaged in war of aggression and killing.
					
					 With no justification can the U.S. cover up its foul colors as the chieftain of manslaughter.
					
					 To kill peaceable civilians by using drones is a never-to-be-condoned hideous crime as this new manslaughter warfare is in contravention of the requirement of international law including the UN Charter.
					
					 Nowadays the U.S. is seeking to attain its military aims through indiscriminate attacks by advanced war means strong in destructive and killing power while keeping its troops from closing in to fighting areas as much as possible.
					
					 It also intends to export such lethal weapons as drone to its allies in a bid to tide over the unfavorable situation of the "war on terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. is mistaken if it thinks it can retrieve its failure in the said war by expanding the area of drone attack. 
					
					 The ceaseless crimes committed by the U.S. by killing civilians by the said means will result in nothing but intensified anti-U.S. resistance and denunciation against it in a worldwide scale. The U.S. would be well advised to judge the reality with cool head and stop its reckless act of harassing peace and killing people, the commentary urges.

articles.title: US Moves to Modernize N-Weapons Blasted
articles.content:
US Moves to Modernize N-Weapons Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. bellicose forces are mulling improving B-61 nuclear bombs and others again. The danger of these moves lies in the fact that they will spark a new nuclear arms race and the improved smaller nukes can be used anytime as conventional weapons.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article. It is the strategic goal of the U.S. imperialists to make preemptive strikes at those countries advancing along the way of independence against imperialism and those countries, which refuse to meekly obey them, any time with smaller nuclear weapons and bring them under their control, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said moves assume more dangerous nature as their spearhead is directed to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists seek to deploy smaller nuclear weapons in south Korea, Japan and other places, to begin with. By doing so, they seek to put increased pressure on the DPRK with nukes and make preemptive strikes at its important underground facilities and others any time by use of smaller nuclear weapons. It was in pursuance of this scenario that the U.S. Department of Defense sent a fact-finding group to Japan and south Korea a few years ago to study the topography and geological structure of the DPRK. The U.S. imperialists are contemplating waging a war on the Korean Peninsula with smaller nuclear weapons.
					
					 If their moves are left unchecked, a nuclear war will spill over to Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 The world peace-loving forces should go united and wage a positive struggle against the above-said moves of the U.S.

articles.title: South Korea's "Grand Bargain" Blasted
articles.content:
South Korea's "Grand Bargain" Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet group peddled the so-called "grand bargain," i.e. "a package solution to the nuclear issue of the north" allegedly calling for giving an "economic reward" in return for the north's dismantlement of its nukes. It is now busy soliciting support for it, ballyhooing that the "grand bargain" paves a new "way for settling the nuclear issue of the north" what it called "irreversible abandonment of the nuclear program" based on a version of "package deal."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentator's article in this regard:
					
					 The "grand bargain" is sheer sophism as it betrayed the puppet group's ignorance about the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 By nature, the puppet group has neither qualification nor face to talk about the nuclear issue or get involved in it. 
					
					 If the puppet group is truly concerned about the nuclear issue, it should apologize for its criminal acts of shielding the U.S. nukes, to begin with, get rid of its American master's "nuclear umbrella", force the U.S. to pull back its imperialist aggressor forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea and come out against the U.S. strategy of preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 Now the Korean Peninsula is in the state of ceasefire and the situation is so tense there that a war may break out any moment. It is self-evident that the DPRK cannot unilaterally dismantle its nukes, risking sacrifices under this situation. 
					
					 The puppet group is sadly mistaken if it calculates the DPRK will willingly respond to the "grand bargain" if it shows off a very big purse for "economic reward." 
					
					 This group seeks to goad the DPRK into abandoning its powerful nuclear deterrent which provides a sure guarantee for protecting the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country by showing such hypocritical "generosity." This is a mean and disgusting thought of the narrow-minded merchants who know nothing but money and business. Such jargon is a mockery of the DPRK. 
					
					 The puppet group had better care for saving south Korean economy from catastrophe and delivering the people from destitution, rather than dealing with the DPRK's nuclear deterrent with the above-said honeyed words.
					
					 It is foolhardy for the political imbeciles who know only economy based on spadework to try to solve the complicated nuclear issue at one time.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the group to try to settle at one time the matters to be dealt with at the last phase of the talks for solving the nuclear issue in the absence of any confidence-building measure. How is it possible to deal with such matters as the withdrawal of the U.S. forces, prerequisite for settling the nuclear crisis, a halt to the joint military exercises, the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. by a version of "package deal" at one time and does it have the mandate to do so?
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the group seeks to apply the "grand bargain" even to the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The puppet group is far-fetchedly insisting that it is a "main party concerned for the nuclear issue" and the issue should be dealt with within the framework of the inter-Korean relations because the "DPRK's nukes" are threats to the south but it only brings to light the group's shameful true colors as servants for the U.S. in its nuclear war and the sinister aim sought by the group in driving the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe.
					
					 The puppet conservative group would be well advised to cogitate about to whom it is obliged for having averted a war to enable it to survive and thank the DPRK. It should stop peddling such foolish offer as "grand bargain" which can convince no one.

articles.title: US Scheme for Forces' Occupation in S. Korea Slashed
articles.content:
US Scheme for Forces' Occupation in S. Korea Slashed
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification staged the 127th "action for independence, reunification and peace" in Seoul on April 13. 
					The organizations accused the U.S. of its recent undisguised moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK, branding them as an action escalating military tensions on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					They charged that the U.S. is seeking to realize the "strategic flexibility" of its forces in south Korea under the pretext of the "transfer of the right to command wartime operations" and have full command over the south Korean army at the time of a war against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. forces are building a new airstrip in Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province with the taxes collected from south Koreans, the organizations deplored, terming their moves a scheme aimed at their permanent presence in south Korea. 
					
					In order to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula and the independent reunification of the nation it is necessary to force the U.S. to withdraw its troops from south Korea as early as possible, they held.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Hungary and Switzerland on April 9 and 10 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th birthday of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					On display in the venues of meetings were photos on the undying feats performed by President
						 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party noted that Kim Il Sung made distinguished contributions to the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung wisely led the protracted anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, liberating the country, and founded the Party, army and state and steered the great Fatherland Liberation War to victory, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people built an independent national economy by their own efforts under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and achieved great successes in all fields of social life.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee emphasized that the glorious revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung was a life based on the faith that the nation's sovereignty is achieved and protected with arms.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il is successfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause pioneered by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Italian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung's Feats
articles.content:
Italian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung's Feats
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, made public a statement titled "Immortal President Kim Il Sung" on April 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Kim Il Sung is immortal thanks to his great ideas and feats, he noted in the statement, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea, providing the immortal guidelines for realizing the cause of independence.
					
					 He steered the revolution and construction to victory by believing in the people and relying on them all his life.
					
					 He dedicated his all to Korea' reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President were formulated as the three charters for national reunification to be invariably held fast to by the Korean nation in the movement for reunification by Kim Jong Il, top leader of the Korean people.
					
					 We express full support and solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification and build a thriving socialist nation, united close around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on April 12.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea, Songun politics is an effective political mode of our era which carried forward and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line, a political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also clarifies the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Conjunto Artistico del EIPC
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito del Interior Popular de Corea.
					Los artistas del conjunto interpretaron en la ocasion el coro femenino "Los soldados cantan de nuestro Comandante Supremo", la cancion del quinteto femenino de guitarristas "Es mejor nuestra patria", el solo masculino y pangchang "La luz primaveral de amor", el solo femenino "La patria te conocera", el solo de Oungum "Camion-cocina", la narracion y solo femenino "Aqui es mi patria de Chollima", el trio de acordeon "Cancion de votos" y otras diversas piezas.
					
					En la ocasion los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico de su gran honor y orgullo de vivir y luchar como soldados revolucionarios del partido y el lider y defensores del pueblo y demostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del EIPC de defender con firmeza nuestro regimen socialista. 
					
					La funcion revolucionaria y combativa, que muestra vividamente el noble mundo espiritual de los vanguardias de la lucha clasista, dejo profundamente impresionados a los espectadores.
					
					El Dirigente felicito el exito del espectaculo respondiendo cordialmente a la aclamacion hospitalaria de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que el Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito del Interior haya ofrecido esa magnifica funcion de alto nivel ideo-artistico signada de entereza politica y espiritu de la epoca, el Dirigente evaluo altamente el exito logrado en la ocasion por los artistas del conjunto y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la creacion y las funciones del conjunto destacando que este tiene una mision y deber muy importantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en disfrutar la funcion el miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Ju Sang Song, el jefe de departamento politico del EIPC Ri Pyong Sam y otros miembros directivos del EIPC, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Wen Jiabao se refiere al desarrollo de relaciones China-Corea
articles.content:
Wen Jiabao se refiere al desarrollo de relaciones China-Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- El embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en China, Choe Jin Su, hizo el dia 13 una visita de despedida al primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la Republica Popular China, Wen Jiabao.
					En la ocasion Wen Jiabao destaco que en el ano pasado, ano en que el 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas China-Corea coincide con el "ano de amistad China-Corea" visito a Corea donde recibio calurosa bienvenida y hospitalidad del partido y el gobierno de Corea y recordo con gran emocion el hecho de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il le acompano personalmente en varios actos y le recibio durante largo tiempo.
					
					La amistad China-Corea, establecida y cultivada por los dirigentes de veterana generacion de ambos paises, es la que supero las pruebas de la historia y muestra nueva vitalidad al paso de los dias, asevero y continuo:
					
					Desarrollar constantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre China y Corea es la invariable orientacion del partido y el gobierno de China.
					
					A traves de la visita realizada en el ano pasado vi con mis propios ojos que Corea logro grandes exitos en la construccion socialista superando toda clase de dificultades.
					
					Por ultimo Wen deseo sinceramente que los coreanos levanten un pais poderoso desarrollando la economia y mejorando la vida del pueblo.

articles.title: Comentarista militar desmiente el rumor sobre caso de "Chonan"
articles.content:
Comentarista militar desmiente el rumor sobre caso de "Chonan"
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- El 26 de marzo por la noche, resulto naufragado de repente el buque de guerra "Chonan" con un tonelaje de mil 400 de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas en las aguas maritimas entre las islas Paekryong y Taechong en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					Al respecto, la banda de los traidores surcoreanos esta difundiendo un rumor, segun el cual la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) esta involucrada en ese accidente.
					
					Un comentarista de asuntos militares publico este sabado su articulo para revelar la falsedad de ese rumor.
					
					Aunque el naufragado buque de guerra de gran tamano es de la parte surcoreana, hasta ahora, la RPDC considero ese accidente como una desgracia lamentable, que no debio suceder, tomando en cuenta que la mayoria de muchos marineros desaparecidos y rescatados son los integrantes de la nacion coreana que se vieron obligados a servir en el ejercito titere surcoreano, comienza el comentario y continua:
					
					Sin embargo, impotentes de esclarecer la causa de hundimiento, los belicistas de la capa militar, los politiqueros conservadores derechistas y otros traidores pretenden neciamente estos dias vincular el siniestro con la RPDC.
					
					Al principio del caso, ellos hablaban de que no se ha detectado ninguna senal de la penetracion del submarino de la RPDC en su "perfecta" red de vigilancia maritima y sistema de radar y de sondeo acustico que funcionan sin parar ni por un momento.
					
					 Pero, cambiando de repente la posicion de que no se debe sacar una conclusion precipitada, comenzaron a hablar del "rumor de la RPDC involucrada en el caso".
					
					 Hasta el traidor Lee Myung Bak, quien exigia al principio no hablar a la ligera sobre la participacion del Norte en el caso, comenzo desde hace poco a pronunciar unos chismes, que apuntan implicitamente a la RPDC, como que "hay que dejar abierta la posibilidad de la participacion del Norte y esclarecerla hasta el final", "se debe hacer frente a los movimientos del Norte" y "tomaria resueltas contramedidas" cuando fuera confirmada definitivamente la causa del accidente.
					
					Los compinches de "Chongwadae", que antes insistian en que "es tenue la posibilidad de ataque del Norte", adoptan tambien la actitud de no descartar ese rumor diciendo que si se toma en cuenta las declaraciones de los supervivientes y el estado del barco hundido, es muy probable que este haya recibido un golpe externo. 
					
					Los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano tratan mas abiertamente de vincular con la RPDC ese accidente ocurrido por la culpa de si mismos con el fin de salir de la irremediable crisis de gobernacion, en que estan empantanados los titeres surcoreanos por su incapaz "gestion de asuntos estatales".
					
					 En el caso de que la opinion publica se inclina a que el accidente se debe al "factor interno" o no se esclarece plenamente su causa, la banda de traidores surcoreanos no podra evitar la gran derrota en las inminentes "elecciones locales del 2 de junio" siendo responsables directos de ello.
					
					Por consiguiente, tendra que caerse en el atolladero sin salida sufriendo la division del campo de conservadores como el "Gran Partido Nacional" y el debilitamiento del poder de dominio.
					
					El rumor en cuestion esta relacionado tambien con otra necia intencion de justificar su anacronica politica sobre el Norte y liberarse de la responsabilidad de haber llevado las relaciones intercoreanas al peor estado.
					
					Todo el mundo sabe que desde el principio de su mandato, la camarilla de traidores persiguio obstinadamente la confrontacion fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas insistiendo en la "renuncia nuclear, primero".  
					
					Ahora, en distintos sectores del Sur de Corea crece cada dia mas el rechazo a la erronea politica sobre la RPDC de la banda traidora que desafia frontalmente a la demanda de la epoca y a la aspiracion nacional.
					
					De ahi que la banda traidora difunde el polemico rumor para eludir la responsabilidad del empeoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y justificar su vil politica sobre la RPDC pretextando el hundimiento del barco.
					
					Detras de la circulacion de tal rumor, hay ademas la intencion de presionar a la RPDC en varios sentidos prolongando la atmosfera internacional de sancionarla.
					
					La banda traidora toma parte activa en las maniobras de su amo encaminadas a aplastar el regimen de la RPDC hablando con bombo y platillo como si estuviera resultando efectiva la sancion anti-RPDC dirigida por EE.UU.
					
					Ademas, actua desesperadamente para detener el gran avance de la RPDC hacia el horizonte de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Es el metodo rutinario de esos tontos inventar algun complot cada vez que se vean en aprietos y cometer estupideces tomandolo por pretexto.
					
					La camarilla de titeres surcoreanos no deben hablar a la ligera viendo correctamente la corriente de la epoca actual.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. por tratar de ampliar ataque
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. por tratar de ampliar ataque
 Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el asesor juridico del Departamento de Estado norteamericano dijo que el articulo del "derecho a la autodefensa" anotado en la ley internacional permite a su gobierno utilizar el avion no tripulado en el conflicto armado contra "Al Qaeda", el Taliban y otras fuerzas armadas y que el golpe a precision de EE.UU., incluyendo el ataque con ese avion, "observa fielmente" todas las leyes aplicables como la de guerra.
					 Esto deviene una descarada sofisteria que pueden pronunciar solo las fuerzas agresoras norteamericanas que se dedican a la guerra de agresion y al asesinato. 
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 17 y continua:
					
					 Aunque EE.UU. utilice todos los pretextos, nunca podra ocultar su sucia naturaleza de peor asesino de seres humanos.
					
					 El uso del avion sin piloto en la matanza de los habitantes pacificos deviene el imperdonable crimen de mayor gravedad, siendo la nueva operacion genocida que contraviene a los requisitos de la ley internacional, incluso la Carta de la ONU.
					
					Ultimamente, EE.UU. se propone alcanzar su objetivo militar mediante un ataque indiscriminado con modernos medios belicos, que puedan destruir y matar mucho, sin desplegar a sus soldados cerca de los campos de combate.
					
					 Y piensa equivocadamente exportar el avion de ese tipo y otras armas letales a los paises aliados para remediar la situacion de la "guerra antiterrorista" que se acerca al fracaso.
					
					  Cada vez que EE.UU. cometa con tales metodos el asesinato de los civiles, seran mas fuertes a escala mundial la lucha antiyanqui y las voces de condena a ese imperio.
					
					 EE.UU. debe dejar de perturbar la paz y asesinar a los hombres viendo la realidad con serenidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica desarrollo de mini-artefactos nucleares por EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica desarrollo de mini-artefactos nucleares por EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- Actualmente, las fuerzas belicistas de Estados Unidos tratan de remodelar de nuevo la bomba nuclear "B-61" y otros artefactos con el fin de usarlos en cualquier momento como armas convencionales.
					Con respecto a esta medida que busca la nueva carrera armamentista nuclear, el diario Rodong Sinmun difundio este sabado un articulo individual que sigue:
					
					Es la meta estrategica de los imperialistas norteamericanos aplastar mediante el ataque preventivo y sorpresivo con mini-artefactos nucleares a los paises en vias de la independencia antiimperialista y los otros desobedientes.
					
					La modernizacion de tales armamentos resulta mas peligrosa para la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea porque esta es el blanco principal de ataque con ellos.
					
					Especificamente, EE.UU. pretende ubicar primero los mini-artefactos nucleares en el Sur de Corea, Japon y otras partes perifericas de la RPDC con el fin de endurecer la presion nuclear sobre ella y atacar preventivamente las importantes instalaciones subterraneas de ella con esos medios nucleares.
					
					En el mismo contexto, unos anos atras, el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. envio un grupo de investigadores a Japon y al Sur de Corea para estudiar la topografia y las estructuras geologicas de la RPDC. 
					
					Si los imperialistas norteamericanos ejecutan la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana con armas nucleares de pequeno tamano, ella se extendera a Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Por lo tanto, las fuerzas del mundo amantes de la paz deben luchar unidos contra las maniobras de EE.UU. para modernizar las armas nucleares con vistas a la guerra nuclear.
